approval_data.project_summary: A simple web application to manage a list of tasks.
approval_data.business_context: This project aims to provide a basic task management tool.
success_criteria: Users can view their task list.
functional_requirements: A user can create a new task with a text description.
A user can see a list of all created tasks.

requirements.title: Functional Requirement 1
requirements.description: A user can create a new task with a text description.

requirements.title: Functional Requirement 2
requirements.description: A user can see a list of all created tasks.

extracted_requirements.title: Functional Requirement 1
extracted_requirements.description: A user can create a new task with a text description.

extracted_requirements.title: Functional Requirement 2
extracted_requirements.description: A user can see a list of all created tasks.

raw_analysis.project_summary: A simple web application to manage a list of tasks.
project_goals: Allow a user to add a task
Allow a user to see their list of tasks
target_audience: Users who want to manage a list of tasks
raw_analysis.business_context: This project aims to provide a basic task management tool.

requirements.description: A user can create a new task with a text description.
A user can see a list of all created tasks.

functional_requirements: A user can create a new task with a text description.
A user can see a list of all created tasks.
success_criteria: Users can view their task list.

recommendations: Add more detailed non-functional requirements (e.g., specific performance metrics, security measures).

identified_gaps: Lack of detailed requirements for user interface, data storage, and security implementation.
recommendations_for_completion: Expand the BRD with detailed specifications for the user interface, data storage, and security protocols.
